content:
I'm going as a patient participant, and @Debi Willis (I believe) is on a panel.

For those who don't know, HDP is a big deal event every year, often the scene for significant pronouncements or at least showboating.
I will be on a panel at the ONC meeting at the end of this month in DC. I won't be attending the HDP this time. I usually go but my schedule is so crazy right now that i need to pass on it.
